Medium: 18 lithographed illustrations (6 by Kozlinskii, 5 by Puni, 4 by Boguslavskaia, and 3 by Makletsov)
Artist: Kseniia Boguslavskaia, Vladimir Kozlinskii, Sergei Makletsov, Jean Pougny (Ivan Puni)
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation (Boris Kerdimun Archive)
Title: Geroi i zhertvy revoliutsii. Oktiabr' 1917-1918
